title: Shopify Graphic Designer
job_overview:
Hi there,

I am the founder of Adgenix Media and now also Edgewater Brands — a new DTC brand focused on high-quality supplements and beauty products. While I’m new to e-commerce brand ownership, I bring 8+ years of experience running a successful performance marketing agency specializing in paid media.

Now that we’ve mastered traffic, I’m ready to build something of my own — and I’m looking for a highly skilled Shopify expert with strong graphic design abilities to help bring this vision to life.??

Who We Are Looking For??
You are a creative Shopify expert who knows how to build beautiful, high-converting eCommerce pages — and understands what makes a customer click buy. You combine technical skill with an eye for design and branding.

What You’ll Be Doing?
- Customizing & optimizing Shopify themes (must be fluent in Liquid/CSS)
- Designing high-converting product and landing pages
- Creating advertorial/interstitial pages for paid traffic
- Designing visual assets: product mockups, banners, graphics, etc.
- Building upsells, bundles, and AOV boosters into the funnel
- Implementing and testing email/SMS flows using Klaviyo or similar
- Executing basic split-tests and visual CRO tweaks


Your Skills:
- 5+ years working with Shopify stores (especially beauty/wellness)
- Strong graphic design experience (Figma, Adobe, Canva, etc.)
- Familiar with page builders (Replo, GemPages, PageFly) and/or custom coding
- Understanding of conversion-focused design for DTC brands
- Ability to work independently and deliver high-quality work quickly
- Available during 9am–5pm EST (or overlapping hours)
- Fluent in English

Why Join Us?
We’re in early-stage growth — and that means lots of creative freedom, a collaborative working style, and the opportunity to be a key part of our launch and scale. For the right person, there’s also long-term potential.
